item.title: Courses @ Dataquest

item.title: EdX HarvardX PH125.1x: Data Science: R Basics
item.description: The course covered an introduction to using R to extract, manipulate and thus analyse data. It basically lays the foundations to using R in data science. Verified EdX Certificate of Achievement Course exercises are linked with a Datacamp course. Data Science R basics Course Notes and code This Jupyter notebook contains code written while following along with the course, which was expanded to illustrate concepts and notes.

item.title: Courses @ Datacamp
item.description: Links to certificates of courses completed on Datacamp Intro to SQL Data Science R basics. Completed as a part of EdX HarvardX PH125.1x: Data Science: R Basics Introduction to Tidyverse Introduction to R for Finance
